Heading: DVD region 2
Note: Japan, Europe, South Africa and Middle East (including Egypt)

Heading: DVD region 3
Note: Southeast Asia, Hong Kong, Macau, South Korea, and Taiwan

Heading: DVD region 4
Note: Australia, New Zealand, Pacific Islands, Central America, Mexico, South America and the Caribbean

Heading: DVD region 5
Note: Eastern Europe (former Soviet Union), Indian subcontinent, Africa, North Korea and Mongolia

Heading: DVD region 6
Note: People’s Republic of China (except Macau and Hong Kong)

Heading: DVD region 8
Note: International venues: aircraft, cruise ships etc

Heading: Blu-Ray region A
Note: North America, Central America, South America, Japan, Taiwan, North Korea, South Korea, Hong Kong, and Southeast Asia

Heading: Blu-Ray region B
Note: Most of Europe, Greenland, French territories, Middle East, Africa, Australia, and New Zealand, plus all of Oceania

Heading: Blu-Ray region C
Note: India, Bangladesh, Nepal, Mainland China, Pakistan, Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Central, and South Asia
